1.0.1.name: wordpress/maxmind
1.0.1.description:
This plugin adds a widget that allows you to easily include the maxmind hotel reservation system into your WordPress hotel site. You can add as many plugins as needed. It works well together with Widget Logic plugin and WPML to create different translations. The plugin automatically includes the proper jQuery scripts from the maxmind servers and is easy to configure.

  • You need a maxmind.eu account for this to work.
